category_description: Small art for big statements. Waterproof, vinyl stickers designed by independent artists.

products.name: Third Eye Holographic
products.description: A glowing indigo eye with rainbow shimmer. Weatherproof vinyl, perfect for water bottles or laptops.
products.tone_hint: Playful yet spiritual — a tiny portal of awareness.

products.name: Mushroom Spirit
products.description: A friendly amanita with tiny sparkles. Hand-illustrated, matte finish.
products.tone_hint: Whimsical and earthy — captures the magic of the forest floor.

products.name: Stay Grounded
products.description: Simple script text with a root illustration beneath. Muted earth tones.
products.tone_hint: A gentle reminder in sticker form.

products.name: Cosmic Cactus
products.description: A desert cactus against a starry night sky. Glossy finish, rich colors.
products.tone_hint: Resilient and vast — the desert meets the cosmos.

products.name: Moon Goddess
products.description: A crescent moon with a feminine face. Hand-drawn in metallic gold and black.
products.tone_hint: Divine and elegant — honoring the sacred feminine.

products.name: Peace Sign Mandala
products.description: Classic peace symbol filled with intricate mandala patterns. Colorful and joyful.
products.tone_hint: Optimistic and harmonious — spreading good vibes.
